casebody.data:
EPIC METALS CORPORATION, Plaintiff/Counterclaim Defendant-Appellant, and Donald H. Landis, Counterclaim Defendant, v. CONSOLIDATED SYSTEMS, INC., Huber, Hunt & Nichols, Inc., and SMI-Owen Steel Co., Inc., Defendants/Counterclaimants-Appellees, and Tampa Bay Arena, Ltd., Defendant/Counterclaim-ant-Appellee. No. 03-1296. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Dec. 9, 2003.

Before NEWMAN, SCHALL, and LINN, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and AD*336JUDGED: AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R 36
